summary: The feedback received is mixed with both positive and negative comments. Clients appreciate the instructors' playlists and the new bands, as well as the cleanliness of the bathrooms. However, they pointed out issues with staff behavior, loud music during classes, and the cleanliness of the showers. Some clients have also expressed dissatisfaction with an instructor's performance.

praise: Clients loved Nina and Andrea's playlists
Zoe at the front desk was appreciated for her kindness
criticism: Rude behavior of a girl at the front desk
The music was too loud during the class
Showers were reported to be dirty
An instructor was termed as terrible, all over the place, and rude

suggestions: Consider offering ankle weights for the barre classes
Ensure all staff are trained to provide good customer service
Ensure cleanliness of all facilities, especially the showers
